projects.title: COMMERCEBAY
projects.description: This is a school project, where i was in a team of 4 people that had 1 week to make a copy of finn.no/ebay.com. It was made using Vue.js and Spring boot with MySQL as the database. I mainly worked on the frontend but i also helped out fixing the security part for backend. Source code and live demo will available soon.

projects.title: Smartmat
projects.description: This is a school project where I worked in a team of 7 people. The project deals with the development of a system using the scrum development method. The problem that the product is supposed to solve has been brought up by the product owner and is about reducing food waste in households. The final product is far from perfect, but is well above the expectations that have been set the vision document. It was created using Nuxt 3, spring boot and MySQL as a database. I mostly worked with the frontend but also contributed a bit on the backend. Source code and live demo will available soon.

projects.title: Project Wargames
projects.description: This project is a school project. It was part of the subject 'Programming 2 - IDATT2001'. It had to be a simple wargame made with javafx.

projects.title: Tournament Creater App
projects.description: This project is a school projects. It was part of the subject 'System development - IDATT1002'.The tournament creater app is an app made to help structure and make e-sport tournaments. This app was made with a group of 6 people. Check out the gitlab link for more information
